name: Spider Solitaire - Lite
description:
Spider Solitaire is similar to other types of solitaire (Klondike, FreeCell, etc.). The goal of the game is to create 8 stacks of cards (king-through-ace). If all 10 foundations have at least one card, you may place additional cards by clicking on the "stock cards" in the bottom-right corner of the screen.

This game with all the superb features, graphics, and animations that you would expect on your iOS device :)

FEATURES
• 1-Suit games
• 2-Suit games
• 4-Suit games
• Crisp, beautiful, and easy to read cards
• Efficient, fast, and sensible game interface
• Single tap to place a card or drag and drop
• Standard Spider Solitaire rules and scoring
• Smart hints show potentially useful moves
• Custom backdrops
• Timer, moves, and statistics
• Unlimited undos
• Auto complete option to finish a solved game
• Global and friends leader boards
• Fun & challenging achievements
• Support Game Center
• Support Retina Display
